Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gillian Guzman
Reviews.Content: Went from using the GW25 to the GW56WD, unbelievable difference/Picture crystal clear/Night visibility incredible.  Will purchase more in future.  Great price also.

Reviews.Title: amazing survalince camera
Reviews.Author: Nickp45j "Nick"
Reviews.Content: This camera is alot bigger than it looks!!! It has a foucus and a zoom that can be manuely controlled. And it has a switch for adjusting settings. And its a very heavy duty camera, its made out of a thick metal and it is pretty vandle proof. And has incredible night vision. I will be buying another one soon!

ProductInfo.Features:
700 TV lines; 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens
Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
0 Lux minimum illumination; OSD Menu
Zoom & focus outside adjusting; Suitable for wall & celling installing
Auto Gain Control Auto Electronic Shutter Adjustment
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc GW56WD 700TVL 1/3-Inch SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Outdoor Security Camera with 2.8-12mm Manual Zoom Lens and 72 IR LEDs (White)
